interaction.name: Jon Snow
interaction.content: If I fall, don't bring me back.

interaction.name: Sansa Stark
interaction.content: I hate the king more than any of them.

interaction.name: Eddard "Ned" Stark
interaction.content: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

interaction.name: Jaime Lannister
interaction.content: The things I do for love.

interaction.name: Tyrion Lannister
interaction.content: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

interaction.name: Sansa Stark
interaction.content: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.
